mapper.insert: insert into WarnLog (ID, STCD, ItemID, Name, WarnTime, FreeTime, WarnState, Value, WarnType, Type, Memo) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{itemID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{warnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{freeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warnState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warnType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update WarnLog set STCD = #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ItemID = #{itemID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, WarnTime = #{warnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FreeTime = #{freeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WarnState = #{warnState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Value = #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WarnType = #{warnType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Type = #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, STCD, ItemID, Name, WarnTime, FreeTime, WarnState, Value, WarnType, Type, Memo from WarnLog where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
